resources.string: Your password will be deleted from this device.

plurals.name: credentialManagementDeleteAllPasswordsDialogFirstInstructionNotSyncedPlural
plurals.item: Your passwords will be deleted from this device.

resources.string: Your password will be deleted from all synced devices.

plurals.name: credentialManagementDeleteAllPasswordsFirstInstructionSyncedPlural
plurals.item: Your passwords will be deleted from all synced devices.

resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this password?

plurals.name: credentialManagementDeleteAllPasswordsDialogConfirmationTitlePlural
plurals.instruction: Placeholder is a number representing how many passwords will be deleted
plurals.item: Are you sure you want to delete %1$d passwords?

resources.string: Make sure you still have a way to access your account.

plurals.name: credentialManagementDeleteAllSecondInstructionPlural
plurals.item: Make sure you still have a way to access your accounts.
